TopicTitle: Kerbol System in Universe Sandbox: Minmus

Articles.Content: Hey folks, I made a model of the kerbol system in universe sandbox, but I can\'t find any information on Minmus. Basically all I need is diameter and density. Pic below of what I have so far:

This here will help you: http://kspwiki.nexisonline.net/wiki/Minmus

I wonder when the 'real' wiki will get updated, though.
Hey that\'s pretty nice! I don\'t really know Universe Sandbox, but I suppose textures are procedural?
It can generate random textures, as well as load up ones for existing bodies, and you can tint them.
Any chance you could post the system file? It could be nice for experimentation purposes :oO
I really want this you could use Universe sandbox to place all the worlds side by side for size comparison. would be good if you could add TWR and aero braking notes to them.
Omfg I just was about to come on here and ask if anyone had made the kerbal system in universe sandbox, and this was the first topic I saw X'D
